About a year ago, I started eating more plant-based foods and learned a lot along the way. It‚Äôs not about being perfect; I don‚Äôt think we all need to go completely vegan. But being a bit mindful of how much animal food we eat and drink can be good for our health and the planet.  

Stay tuned, I'll share lots of interesting science facts and give you tips for small changes that can make a big difference.

We can't really change how animals are treated on these farms directly, but we can choose more vegetables and meat alternatives (like plant-based schnitzel, sausages, and burgers) instead of animal meat. It's kinda the quickest way to help make animals' lives better, yh?
